author: veithen
msg: Fixed the dependencies of synapse-transports: The HTTP NIO transport depends on a few methods from the blocking HTTP transport, so we need to add this as an explicit dependency.

author: srowen
msg: Fixed the example's file naming convention since some files were being incorrectly read as update data files
